results.definition: make illegal payments to in exchange for favors or influence

examples: the stock was a real buy at that price

results.definition: obtain by purchase; acquire by means of a financial transaction
examples: She buys for the big department store

results.definition: acquire by trade or sacrifice or exchange
examples: She wanted to buy his love with her dedication to him and his work

results.definition: be worth or be capable of buying
examples: This sum will buy you a ride on the train
